title: LF an ADC to smurf in Bronze/Silver with

embed.description: Watch AstreaMyrth's League of Legends video: Gold elo shenanigans #smurfing - Plays.tv

body:
Add me if ur Diamond+, an adc main, and have an account in bronze/silver

https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=astrea+myrth
